title: How to unsubscribe from Chewy Autoship
description: Chewy Autoship is a subscription service that allows you to schedule regular deliveries of pet supplies. You can cancel your Chewy Autoship subscription at any time without cancellation fees. Here's how:

web.title: Cancel Chewy Autoship via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Chewy Autoship subscription via the website:

*   Log in to your Chewy account on chewy.com.
*   Click on "Manage Autoship".
*   Select the Autoship plan you wish to cancel.
*   Click on "Cancel This Autoship" at the bottom of the page.
*   Cancel at least 24 hours before your next scheduled shipment.

phone.title: Cancel Chewy Autoship via Phone
phone.description:
To cancel your Chewy Autoship subscription via phone:

*   Call Chewy customer service at 1-800-672-4399.
*   Inform the customer service representative that you want to cancel your Autoship subscription.
*   Confirm the cancellation to avoid future charges.

seo_text: Cancel Chewy Autoship subscription. Stop recurring deliveries from Chewy.com. Manage your Chewy Autoship and prevent unwanted charges. Easy steps to cancel Chewy subscription.
